txt_en: When you undervalue what you do, the world will undervalue who you are.
txt_cn: 当你低估自己所做的事情时，世界同时也会低估你的价值。

txt_en: The man who has made up his mind to win will never say "impossible".
txt_cn: 决心取得胜利的人从来不说“不可能”。

txt_en: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
txt_cn: 如果你想振奋自己， 先振奋周遭的人。

txt_en: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
txt_cn: 你无法打败那位永不放弃的人。

txt_en: Develop your imagination – you can use it to create in your mind what you hope to create in your life.
txt_cn: 发展你的想像力 – 你可以用它在心里创造你想在现实生活创造的东西。

txt_en: One always has enough time, if one will apply it well.
txt_cn: 人总是有足够的时间，如果他好好利用。

txt_en: Leadership belongs to those who take it.
txt_cn: 领导权属于那些想获取它的人。

txt_en: Beware of monotony; it's the mother of all deadly sins.
txt_cn: 当心一成不变; 它是万恶之母。

txt_en: I'd rather regret the things I've done than regret the things I haven't done.
txt_cn: 我宁可后悔我曾做过的事，也不要懊悔我从未去做。

txt_en: Learn from the mistakes of others. You can't live long enough to make them yourself.
txt_cn: 试着从别人的错误当中学习，因为你没办法用自己的生命实际感受过每一个错误。

txt_en: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
txt_cn: 如果你的行为鼓舞别人梦想更多、学习更多、行动更多及改变更多，你即是位领导者。

txt_en: Growth and comfort do not coexist.
txt_cn: 成长与舒适是不并存的。

txt_en: If you are not doing what you love, you are wasting your time.
txt_cn: 若非在做你喜爱的事，你就是在浪费时间。

txt_en: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
txt_cn: 团结合作胜过于单打独斗。

txt_en: Life is not always a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well.
txt_cn: 人生不只是握有一付好牌，有时候也要把一付坏牌打好。

txt_en: If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.
txt_cn: 如果我能看得更远，是因为站在巨人的肩膀上。

txt_en: Coming together is a beginning, staying together is progress, and working together is success.
txt_cn: 同流是开端，持续相伴是进展，共同奋斗才是成功。

txt_en: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships.
txt_cn: 天赋可以赢得游戏，但团队合作及智慧可以赢得冠军。

txt_en: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
txt_cn: 帮助他人成功是让自己最快获得成功的不二法门。

txt_en: Love starts when we push aside our ego and make room for someone else.
txt_cn: 爱始于把自我推到一旁，留些空间给别人。

txt_en: At the courier station of Handan on Winter Solstice night, my arms clasping my knees, only my shadow is accompanying me.
txt_cn: 邯郸驿里逢冬至，抱膝灯前影伴身。

txt_en: Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean.
txt_cn: 单独来看， 我们都像是水滴。 当凝聚在一起， 我们就是一片海洋。

txt_en: Christmas Eve blessing, for you around.
txt_cn: 平安夜的祝福，为你围绕。

txt_en: May the Christmas candle bring you peace and happiness.
txt_cn: 愿圣诞之夜的烛光，带给你温馨和芬芳。
